ValidationRule.description: When "other" is selected as the primary or secondary competitor, other cannot be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(Primary_Competitor__c, "Other"), ISPICKVAL(Secondary_Competitor__c, "Other")) , ISBLANK( Other_Competitor__c),NOT(ISBLANK( Other_Competitor__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If "Other" is selected as the primary or secondary competitor, you must populate the Other Competitor field. If "Other Competitor" is populated you must have primary or secondary selected as "Other"
